name: Medieval Aliens
description:
Random generated aliens will try to reach at you (kinda like the mobs in Minecraft). 

If they reach, a dice-based battle starts.

 To stop the aliens you need to defeat their bosses in especified locations.

Good luck, you will need it!

Kenney Game Jam 2019 submission - Unlikely combinations

If your game didn't load, try relaunch your browser.

SPOILER ALERT: 

MAP FULL DETAILED BELLOW
if you're struggling to find the bosses, here they are.
